scenario_1.persona_content: A technology enthusiast who is interested in the latest developments in the Internet of Things (IoT) and its potential applications in the aviation industry. This person is likely to be familiar with the concept of IoT and its benefits, and is interested in how it can be used to avoid incidents like the Malaysian Airlines crash. This person is also likely to have a good understanding of the airline industry and its operations, as well as the role of IoT in enhancing the efficiency and safety of flights.
scenario_1.thought: As someone interested in fairness and the benefits of collaboration (much like the interconnectedness IoT aims to achieve), I would prefer a more equitable distribution. The right option gives both Person A and me a substantial amount (400), whereas the left option gives me more (600) but Person A nothing. While the extra 200 would be nice, I think the more equitable split reflects my values better. Therefore, I choose the right option.
